Text: Farmer @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart has the summer seeds in stock 3 days in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^^I look forward to seeing you today, tomorrow, the 28th at the latest, planning ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart

Farmer @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart has the fall seeds in stock 3 days in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^^I look forward to seeing you today, tomorrow, the 28th at the latest, planning ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart

Farmer @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart has the spring seeds in stock 3 days in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^^I look forward to seeing you today, tomorrow, the 28th at the latest, planning ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
